question: Wie nennen die Autoren die Lösungen, die sie durch die konforme Transformation der Kerr-Lösung in der allgemeinen Relativitätstheorie erhalten?

question: Gib eine kurze (max. 2 Sätze) Zusammenfassung und füge genau zwei wortgleiche Zitate aus dem Paper hinzu. Format exakt: Summary: <...>\nQuote1: <...>\nQuote2: <...>
expected_final:
Summary: The paper reports exact solutions for rotating black holes obtained via a conformal transformation of the Kerr solution, which it calls conformal Kerr solutions. It discusses geodesic motion in the conformal Kerr spacetime and states that null geodesics match Kerr while timelike geodesics differ due to an effective external force from the parity-violating conformal factor.
Quote1: general relativity, which we dub conformal Kerr solutions.
Quote2: While null geodesics remain the same as those in the Kerr
spacetime, timelike geodesics exhibit interesting differences due to an effective external force caused
by the parity-violating conformal factor.
evidence:
violating ghost-free metric theories from general relativity. We obtain exact solutions for rotating
black holes in such theories by performing the conformal transformation on the Kerr solution in
general relativity, which we dub conformal Kerr solutions. We explore the geodesic motion of a test
particle in the conformal Kerr spacetime. While null geodesics remain the same as those in the Kerr
spacetime, timelike geodesics exhibit interesting differences due to an effective external force caused
by the parity-violating conformal factor.
notes: Dieser Fall prüft harte Format-Compliance (exakte Quote-Zeilen) und dass die Summary nur Aussagen macht, die im Abstract stehen.

question: Wohin verschiebt DSPy laut Paper den Aufbau neuer LM-Pipelines (wörtlich/inhaltlich nach der Formulierung im Text)?
